sentence.Network_en: He can perform an astonishing variety of acts, including mime and juggling.
sentence.Network_cn: 他能表演好几种令人惊叹的把戏，包括哑剧和玩杂耍。

sentence.Network_en: I find life more charming and more astonishing than I'd ever dreamed.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现生活比我想象的更迷人、更不可思议。

sentence.Network_en: Interviews with politicians were juxtaposed with news items of quite astonishing triviality.
sentence.Network_cn: 对政治家的访谈与内容相当耸动的八卦新闻放在同一个版面。

entry.tran: 令人惊讶的；非常惊人的
entry.def: Something that is astonishing is very surprising.

example.ex: It's astonishing, he's learned Latin in three hours!
example.tran: 他花了3个小时就学会了拉丁文，真让人吃惊！

sentences.sentence: "she does an amazing amount of work"
"the dog was capable of astonishing tricks"

means.word_mean: 2. so surprisingly impressive as to stun or overwhelm;

sentences.sentence: "the amount of money required was staggering"
"the figure inside the boucle dress was stupefying"

auth_sentence.content: The breadth of ideas on display here is astonishing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The breadth of ideas on display here is astonishing.

auth_sentence.content: The uptake is astonishing and the audience is empowered.
auth_sentence.res_content: The uptake is astonishing and the audience is empowered.

Sentence.sentence: That was partly due to his talents: showmanship, strategic vision, an astonishing attention to detail and a dictatorial management style which many bosses must have envied.
But what was perhaps most astonishing about Mr Jobs was the absolute loyalty he managed to inspire in customers
What was the most astonishing part of Mr Jobs's success?

sentences.en: The new houses have been built with astonishing speed.
sentences.cn: 这些房子的修建速度快得惊人。

sentences.en: Borrowing is set to soar to an astonishing ￡60 billion.
sentences.cn: 借款很可能猛增至惊人的600 亿英镑。

sentences.en: His first hit record marked the onset of an astonishing career.
sentences.cn: 他的第一张风行一时的唱片标志着惊人事业的开始。
